title: Since I Wasn’t a Saint, I Decided to Become a Cook at the Royal Palace! - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Cooking   Fat Protagonist   Fat to Fit   Female Protagonist   Summoning Magic
author: Kamiyama Rio   神山りお
description:
Since I wasn't a saint, I decided to become a cook at the royal palace!

'I summoned a Holy Maiden! Not a pig!!'
What awaited her in this New World, where she was summoned, was a series of unexpected situations.
'I'm sorry? Who are you? Why are you yelling at me and telling me what to do?'

On top of that, the rice served here was tasteless and unpalatable.
'I love to eat and cook' Rina said 'I'll do it myself. Show me where's the kitchen!'

The meals Rina's prepared captivated the hearts and stomachs everyone, even the King and the Princes.
They can't resist Rina's cooking and her innocent personality.

'If you want a good meal, I'll take care of it!'
Rina begins to enjoy the 'slow life' of the other world, with her heart pounding for the beautiful King and the Princes.
'I'm not a professional cook, so there's no need of critics'>
